meanings.definition: Having or showing great skill or proficiency.
meanings.sent1: Her masterly painting captured the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent2: The chef's masterly culinary skills impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent3: The masterly magician made the rabbit disappear in a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: His masterly control over the situation saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The masterly musician played the piano with incredible precision.

meanings.sent1: The masterly crafted sculpture was admired by all who saw it.

meanings.sent4: His masterly handling of the situation prevented any further issues.
meanings.sent5: The masterly written novel kept readers captivated until the end.

meanings.definition: In a manner befitting a master.
meanings.sent1: He played the piano masterly, earning applause from the audience.
meanings.sent2: She danced masterly across the stage, captivating everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked masterly, creating a dish fit for royalty.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted masterly, bringing the canvas to life.
meanings.sent5: The athlete performed masterly, breaking the previous record.
